Dialogue.Page: Mod: New Horizons Examples Author: Xen
New Horizons Examples is exactly what it sounds like, a mod created to showcase the different features implemented in New Horizons.
Despite being created as a form of documentation for the usage of New Horizons features, this mod is still fun to explore and is the source of many inside jokes referenced by the community.
The mod is regularly updated to implement any new features in New Horizons, ensuring that it can serve as a reference for novice and experienced modders alike.
